Omu Rice

Omu rice is a popular Japanese dish consisting of fried rice wrapped in a fluffy omelette. It is
often served with a tangy tomato-based sauce and garnished with green onions or ketchup.

Ingredients

  • - 2 Cups Rice
  • - 1 Small Onion
  • - 1 Tablespoon Butter
  • - 1 Teaspoon Oil
  • - 3 Tablespoon Tomato Ketchup
  • - Salt
  • - 2 Large Egg
  • - 2 Tablespoons Milk
  • - Oil

About Recipedia

cooking! Our website is designed to help extend knowledge about cooking and provide valuable
resources for those who wish to learn more about the culinary arts.
